title: Glazing
creator_credit: Richard Philps and Educational Foundation for Visual Aids
brief_description: The film deals entirely with glazing, demonstrating the techniques of glazing mugs, jugs, dishes and bowls, and the decorative effects that can be obtained. The use of transparent glaze is explained and in addition, extra glazing effects such as matt stoneware glaze and oxides on rough and smooth surfaces are demonstrated.
